Name: OpenSlowly
Text: I have opened the door slowly, caution is wise

Name: OpenWithKick
Text: I have kicked down the door. A man of god could not be expected to show kindness to evil's property.

Name: FoundKey
Text: I have found this key in the closet room. Not a very good hiding place.

Name: GotRing
Text: Why must mistress never get this ring? This must be related to the curse.

Name: FoundRing
Text: I'v found this ring in the zombies ashes.

Name: ZombieStory
Text: The zombie told me about a 'mistress'. Seems like there are dark forces at play here.

Name: ZombieDestroyed
Text: The zombie iv found in the kitchen has been destroyed.

Name: StoodMyGround
Text: Iv encountered an illusion in the living room. Probably meant to ward off the simple folk.

Name: GhastDestroyed
Text: Iv destroyed the ghast in the living room. I should anticipate encountering more minions.

Name: GateOpened
Text: The key fit the locked gate. I sense negligence.

Name: TheButler
Text: It seems that 'Mistress' keeps ghouls as butlers. And she is 'down below'. How do i get there?

Name: AnotherServant
Text: I should find out more about this 'Robert'.

Name: GhoulDestroyed
Text: Another cursed soul put to rest.

Name: TreasureHint
Text: Iv found an inscription on the dinner table. It reads: 'Fortunes close. Masked by time'.

Name: BrokenClock
Text: The large clock seems to be broken.

Name: ClockScribble
Text: Could it be this simple? Might as well try it.

Name: ClockHandsMoved
Text: I think the clock triggered a mechanism. Maybe something moved around somewhere?

Name: IvFoundRobert
Text: Iv found roberts ghost.

Name: UnholyMistress
Text: Robert claims to have been the rightful owner of the estate. He referred to mistress as “it”. She seems to have unholy powers. I should not underestimate her.

Name: IHaveBanishedRobert
Text: Robert is no more.

Name: ShadowDestroyed
Text: I have banished the evil shadow back from whence it came.

Name: IHaveReleasedRobert
Text: Robert seems to have been a victim. His death must be related to the curse. He is now free from his torment.

Name: ShadowBlownUp
Text: Its good to know that ghosts are vulnerable to explosions. Shame for the chest though.

Name: ShadowDamage
Text: The shadow hurt me. I should be ore careful.

Name: SeveredHead
Text: I guess this 'ROBERT' person was of some importance.

Name: RobertsHead
Text: I have found poor Roberts head. But i cant help but wonder, where is the rest of him?

Name: Nitroglycerine
Text: Iv used the apparatus in the laboratory to make a vial of nitroglycerine. This is a very potent chemical. I should be careful when using it.

Name: LargeRuby
Text: I have found a valuable gem.

Name: GemInMirror
Text: So thats what the gem was for.

Name: BrokenMirror
Text: Brute force is always an option.

Name: TheGargoyleLetMePass
Text: Im glad that i kept Roberts head, i would not want to fight that gargoyle. I hate gargoyles.

Name: GargoyleDamage
Text: Damn those stone fists hurt. I hate gargoyles.

Name: GargoyleDestroyed
Text: What a beast. If mistress is at least this tough... Looks like i have my work set for me.

Name: EvilCrossDestroyed
Text: I have destroyed this affront to our lord.

Name: ImpsDestroyed
Text: I have destroyed each and very one of the imps.

Name: ImpsBribed
Text: These simple creatures are easy to distract.

Name: IvFoundRobertsBody
Text: It would appear that roberts death had a central role to play in the ritual for the curse which holds this place.

Name: MistressIsClose
Text: Mistress is waiting behind the big decorated door.

Name: TheCurse
Text: So mistress was the one to who placed the curse, also on herself. What madness is this?
